query: "What was my heart rate on December 2, 2020, and was it within a normal range?"
resource_summaries: This record is an observation of a patient's heart rate, taken on December 2, 2020, showing a value of 120.49 beats per minute.
answer: Your heart rate on December 2, 2020, was 120.49 beats per minute. A normal resting heart rate for adults is typically between 60-100 beats per minute, so your heart rate on that day was slightly elevated.
